Shenzhen Meidong acoustics Co. LTD was founded in 2009. It involves R&D manufacturing and sales. As a modern innovative audio company, our key competitiveness is innovation ability. Since foundation, we adhere to the concept of development that contains high technology, fashion and aesthetic all the time, keeping developing advanced audio sound technology in the world. Weâ€™re speacialized in producing and creating Vibration speaker, Bluetooth & Wifi speaker, Bluetooth & ANC Headphoneï¼ŒTV headphones, Sound bar, ANC
